LoanApplicantEmployment.name: LoanApplicantEmployment
LoanApplicantEmployment.description: Represents details about the borrower's or co-borrower's current and past employment.

CurrentJobAdditionalMonthCount.description: Additional number of months employed at this job (less than 12).

CurrentJobYearCount.description: Number of full years employed at this job.

EmployerAddress.description: Address of borrower's employer or business.

EmployerGeocodeAccuracy.description: The level of accuracy of a location’s geographical coordinates compared with its physical address. A geocoding service typically provides this value based on the address’s latitude and longitude coordinates.

EmployerLatitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90 with up to 15 decimal places.

EmployerLongitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and 180 with up to 15 decimal places.

EmployerName.description: Name of borrower's employer or business.

EmploymentExtIdentifier.description: ID that uniquely identifies imported data in an external data source (if applicable). This field is unique within your organization.

EndDate.description: Borrower's last date of employment at this job.

IsLessThanQuarterShare.description: Indicates whether borrower owns less than 25 percent of this business (if applicable).

IsRelToTransactionParty.description: Indicates whether borrower is employed by a family member, propery seller, real estate agent, or other person party to the loan application transaction.

IsSelfEmployed.description: Indicates whether borrower is self-employed or owns the business.

JobTitle.description: The borrowers job title or employer’s business or industry type.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LoanApplicantId.description: ID of the borrower associated with employment details.

LoanApplicationId.description: ID of the loan application associated with this borrower's employment information.

MonthlyBaseIncomeAmount.description: Borrower's base monthly income from this job.

MonthlyBonusAmount.description: Borrower's monthly bonus from this job.

MonthlyCommissionAmount.description: Borrower's monthly commission from this job.

MonthlyIncome.description: Borrower's monthly income or loss from this business.

MonthlyMilitaryEntlAmt.description: Borrower's monthly military entitlement from this job.

MonthlyOtherIncomeAmount.description: Borrower's other monthly income from this job.

MonthlyOvertimeAmount.description: Borrower's monthly overtime income from this job.

MonthlyTotalIncomeAmount.description: Borrower's total monthly income from this job.

Name.description: Name of the loan applicant employment.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who owns this record.

StartDate.description: Date borrower started working at this job.
